thread.title: BRIEF-Artisan Partners Asset Management Says Its Assets Under Management As Of March 31, 2018 Totaled $114.8 Bln

title: BRIEF-Artisan Partners Asset Management Says Its Assets Under Management As Of March 31, 2018 Totaled $114.8 Bln

organizations.name: brief-artisan partners asset management says its assets under management

text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:29 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Artisan Partners Asset Management Says Its Assets Under Management As Of March 31, 2018 Totaled $114.8 Bln Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Artisan Partners Asset Management Inc : 
* ARTISAN PARTNERS ASSET MANAGEMENT INC. REPORTS MARCH 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT 
* ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 TOTALED $114.8 BILLION. 
* ITS ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 TOTALED $114.8 BILLION 
* SEPARATE ACCOUNTS ACCOUNTED FOR $56.9 BILLION OF TOTAL FIRM AUM AS OF MARCH 31 
* ARTISAN FUNDS AND ARTISAN GLOBAL FUNDS ACCOUNTED FOR $57.9 BILLION OF TOTAL AUM AS OF MARCH 31 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
